functionName.description: Name of the Lambda function to deploy. If not set, will use the project name.

awsRegion.description: AWS region to deploy to. If not set, will use the region of the current profile.

assumeRoleARN.description: ARN of the role to assume for the AWS API calls. If not set, will use the current profile.

s3Bucket.description: S3 bucket to upload the package to. If not set, will update the function code directly.

s3Key.description: S3 key to upload the package to. If not set, the key will be the <project-name>.zip.

deleteLocalPackage.description: Delete the local package .zip after deploy.

packageFilePath.description: Path to the local package to deploy.

compressionLevel.description: Compression level to use when creating the package .zip. 0-9, 0=none, 9=max. Default is 9.

buildDirectoryPath.description: Path to the directory containing the code to deploy.

publish.description: Publish a new version of the function.
